contentList.content: A Jujutsu Sorcerer can use cursed energy to cause extra damage
Punch twice in quick succession dealing [1] and [2] for both strikes.
Hit a target with a quick strike dealing [1] and [2].
You are master in hand-to-hand combats, coating your fists in cursed energy to cause damage to your enemy.
%%% Tech -Used for unlocking and removing Flurry of Blows Necrotic spell for Jujutsue Sorcerer
Hit a target with two quick strikes dealing [1] and [2] for both strikes
Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [1] while you are not wearing armour or using a shield.
Cursed energy is a supernatural energy produced by negative emotions in all living beings

Your body is as resilient as any armour from hardening it with Cursed Energy. While not wearing armour, you add your Dexterity and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

Attacks with <LSTag Tooltip="JujutsuSorcererWeapons">Jujutsu Sorcerer weapons</LSTag> and unarmed attacks scale with your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> instead of your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> if your Dexterity is higher.
Attacks with <LSTag Tooltip="JujutsuSorcererWeapon">Jujutsu Sorcerer Weapons</LSTag> and unarmed attacks deal [1], unless their normal damage is higher.
After making an attack with a <LSTag Tooltip="JujutsuSorcererWeapon">Jujutsu Sorcerer Weapon</LSTag> or while unarmed, you can make another unarmed attack as a bonus action.
